comments.author: Ben
comments.content: I dig the retro look. My only suggestion would be to darken the avocado link color a bit. It is kind of hard to read on the white and light grey backgrounds.

comments.author: Kasey
comments.content: Looks great! I love the little characters on the side of your header.

comments.author: radish
comments.content: looks great -- congrats on the new design. :)

comments.author: The Other Tiger
comments.content: I like it!  I agree with Ben that the link color could be a little darker to make the links more readable, but otherwise I like the color combination a lot.  The banner and the typography are great!

comments.author: fanny
comments.content:
looooove it. but then, I usually can't resist an orange-dressed little person. so damn adorable!

as or the link colour, I think it's just great!

good job guys. xo

comments.author: veggiebelly
comments.content: It always helps to be related to a web designer! Everything opens perfectly in my browser :)

comments.author: Tammy
comments.content: Slick site -- I think your smilin' face is the best! Great work.

comments.author: Fenke
comments.content: I love your new layout! it is so much "fresher" (can you say that in english?). and who could resist those three little veggie-guys waving & smiling anyways?

comments.author: Angela
comments.content: Michael! I love the new design and I love the little guys all dressed up like fruits and veggies.
